kpi.name: M1031C1

kpi_info.title: MAX NUMBER OF HSUPA USERS PER WBTS
kpi_info.use: The maximum number of simultaneous HSUPA users per WBTS. In this context ""HSUPA user"" means a user who has got have at least one E-DCH radio link in the BTS, either in the serving radio link set, or in a non-serving radio link set. UPDATED:The number of HSUPA users is sampled with one-second interval.

kpi.kpi_alias: MAX NUMBER OF HSUPA USERS PER WBTS
